article_title: We Don’t Need a Mirror, We Need a Leader
article_text: Regarding Holman Jenkins’s “Trump Voters Need a Mirror” (Business World, March 2): When I look in the mirror, I see 16-plus years of Midwestern education and values. When I look in the mirror, I see someone who from the first opportunity in 1968 pulled the lever for Richard Nixon and has been voting Republican ever since. I see someone who has worked for privately held companies that were leveraging resources on a daily basis, and not for public unions. I see someone who is tired of being told by this administration how I have to change my thinking on the definition of marriage, change my view of illegal immigration,...

article_metadata.article.origheadline: We Don’t Need a Mirror, We Need a Leader

article_summary:
Regarding Holman Jenkins’s “Trump Voters Need a Mirror” (Business World, March 2): When I look in the mirror, I see 16-plus years of Midwestern education and values.
When I look in the mirror, I see someone who from the first opportunity in 1968 pulled the lever for Richard Nixon and has been voting Republican ever since.
I see someone who is tired of being told by this administration how I have to change my thinking on the definition of marriage, change my view of illegal immigration,...
I see someone who has worked for privately held companies that were leveraging resources on a daily basis, and not for public unions.
